about_the_game:
Milestone is a first-person walking simulation game set in a medieval fantasy world where you explore anomalies.

You can reach the end by carefully observing the changes and finding secrets hidden everywhere.

  • Anomaly Exploration

Basically, you control with WASD and mouse. When you find anomaly, go back. If the way back is blocked, go find another path.

  • Hidden Place Exploration

You can explore outside of the anomaly investigation range. There are special items that will help your progress in the game, so we recommend looking around.

  • Secret Ending

There are two endings of this game. Complete the hidden conditions and check out another story.

  • Content Warning

Please be advised that this game contains:

*Visual depictions of severed body parts and human remains

*Scenes that may trigger photosensitive epilepsy

*Sudden horror elements

Players should exercise caution when engaging with this content
